name: The PenguinGame 2 -Lies of Penguin
description:
Pass the trials of the penguin wise men and save Antarctica!

The Penguin Game2 : Lies of Penguin is an action game made with a deep impression of the soul-like genre. The story of the penguin hero's desperate struggle to save Antarctica, a total of 7 types of high difficulty boss battles, and 2 endings have been implemented.







Human destruction of the environment has caused the earth's temperature to rise. Antarctica is turning into an environment where the glaciers are melting, making it difficult for penguins to live. You appear in a hopeless penguin village after pulling a legendary club from a rock. Pass the trials of the 4 penguin wise men and awaken as a hero! You are the only penguin who can save Antarctica from crisis and take revenge on humans.
